name: Helicopter
description: A flying machine with a spinning propeller mounte on the roof. Unlike airplanes this vehicle can easily flight up or down vertically.

name: Computer
description: A piece of plastic powered by electricity. This box can store data inside of it. It can also cumminicate wth outher pieces of metal

name: Candles
description: Forms of wax in different shapes and colors. Used to produce light and auromas in a room. Candles can be dangerous when left unattended.

name: Sword
description: An ancient weapon of death. The sword is capable of slicing living beings in half, or decapitation. Some blades glow blue when orcs are near.
